sentences.sentence_en: The intermittent wifi signal made it difficult to join the video meeting.

sentences.sentence_en: Intermittent fasting is a popular method for managing weight these days.

sentences.sentence_en: His attendance at the coding bootcamp was sporadic at best.

sentences.sentence_en: You need to do periodic maintenance on your smartphone to keep it fast.

sentences.sentence_en: Recurrent expenses can drain a startup's budget quickly.

sentences.sentence_en: Frequent updates to the app can be annoying for users.

sentences.sentence_en: Startups face constant changes in the market environment.

sentences.sentence_en: Make sure to take regular breaks while studying.

sentences.sentence_en: Freelancers often have irregular working hours.

sentences.sentence_en: Irregular eating habits can lead to health problems.

sentences.sentence_en: The buses here run at irregular intervals.

sentences.sentence_en: We noticed irregular activity on the user account.

sentences.sentence_en: The tiled floor had an irregular pattern.

sentences.sentence_en: The semiconductor industry is known to be cyclical.

sentences.sentence_en: Fashion trends are cyclical and often come back.

sentences.sentence_en: We study the cyclical nature of the economy in class.

sentences.sentence_en: Moods can be cyclical depending on the season.

sentences.sentence_en: Startup funding often follows a cyclical pattern.

sentences.sentence_en: We check the server logs hourly to ensure stability.

sentences.sentence_en: Hourly reminders on my phone help me drink water.

sentences.sentence_en: The art museum hosts a biennial exhibition.

sentences.sentence_en: We have a biennial conference for all global employees.

sentences.sentence_en: This plant is biennial, flowering in its second year.

sentences.sentence_en: The biennial budget review is coming up next month.

sentences.sentence_en: Funding is a perennial problem for many startups.

sentences.sentence_en: His habitual lateness annoyed his coworkers.

sentences.sentence_en: She is a habitual coffee drinker every morning.

sentences.sentence_en: Habitual checking of smartphones can reduce focus.

sentences.sentence_en: We need to break habitual patterns to innovate.

sentences.sentence_en: He made a habitual glance at his watch.

sentences.sentence_en: It is customary to tip 20% in American restaurants.

sentences.sentence_en: Taking off shoes is customary in many Asian homes.

sentences.sentence_en: It is customary to bring a small gift when visiting.

sentences.sentence_en: Checking emails is part of my morning routine.

sentences.sentence_en: The server underwent routine maintenance last night.

sentences.sentence_en: It was just a routine checkup at the hospital.

sentences.sentence_en: Following a routine helps children feel secure.

sentences.sentence_en: Cooking dinner became a boring routine for him.

sentences.sentence_en: We need a systematic approach to solve these bugs.
sentences.sentence_ko: 이 버그들을 해결하려면 체계적인 접근 방식이 필요합니다.

sentences.sentence_en: She conducted a systematic review of the literature.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그녀는 문헌에 대한 체계적인 검토를 수행했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: A systematic search was launched to find the lost file.
sentences.sentence_ko: 잃어버린 파일을 찾기 위해 체계적인 검색이 시작되었습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: The factory has a systematic process for quality control.

sentences.sentence_en: We have meetings on alternate Mondays.

sentences.sentence_en: Use alternate layers of cheese and sauce in the lasagna.
sentences.sentence_ko: 라자냐에 치즈와 소스를 번갈아 가며 층층이 쌓으세요.

sentences.sentence_en: You should alternate between running and walking.

sentences.sentence_en: Farmers alternate crops to keep the soil healthy.

sentences.sentence_en: Please use the alternate route due to traffic.

sentences.sentence_en: It rained for five consecutive days during our trip.

sentences.sentence_en: Number the pages in consecutive order.

sentences.sentence_en: We released three successive versions of the app.

sentences.sentence_en: Successive governments have failed to solve the problem.

sentences.sentence_en: The plant produces successive blooms throughout summer.

sentences.sentence_en: She achieved success in successive business ventures.

sentences.sentence_en: He has a spasmodic interest in learning the guitar.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그는 기타 배우기에 대해 발작적인(했다 안 했다 하는) 관심을 보입니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Work on the project was spasmodic and disorganized.
sentences.sentence_ko: 프로젝트 작업은 산발적이고 체계적이지 못했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: The car made spasmodic movements before stopping.
sentences.sentence_ko: 차가 멈추기 전에 덜컥거리는 움직임을 보였습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: She suffered from spasmodic coughing fits.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그녀는 발작적인 기침으로 고통받았습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: His attendance at the gym was spasmodic.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그의 체육관 출석은 들쑥날쑥했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: I had a fitful sleep before the important interview.
sentences.sentence_ko: 중요한 면접을 앞두고 잠을 설쳤습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: The wind was fitful, changing direction constantly.

sentences.sentence_en: Progress on the startup has been fitful lately.
sentences.sentence_ko: 최근 스타트업의 진행 상황이 오락가락합니다.

sentences.sentence_en: The baby's breathing was fitful while crying.
sentences.sentence_ko: 아기가 울 때 호흡이 불규칙했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: We made fitful attempts to fix the old computer.
sentences.sentence_ko: 우리는 낡은 컴퓨터를 고치기 위해 단속적으로 시도했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: It is a rare opportunity to meet such a famous CEO.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그렇게 유명한 CEO를 만나는 것은 드문 기회입니다.

sentences.sentence_en: We spotted a rare bird during our journey.
sentences.sentence_ko: 우리는 여행 중에 희귀한 새를 발견했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Errors like this are rare in our software.
sentences.sentence_ko: 우리 소프트웨어에서 이런 오류는 드뭅니다.

sentences.sentence_en: She has a rare talent for coding.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그녀는 코딩에 보기 드문 재능이 있습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: He likes his steak cooked rare.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그는 스테이크를 레어로 익혀 먹는 것을 좋아합니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Bus service to this village is infrequent.
sentences.sentence_ko: 이 마을로 가는 버스 운행은 드뭅니다.

sentences.sentence_en: My visits to the dentist have been infrequent.
sentences.sentence_ko: 치과에 가는 횟수가 뜸했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: He makes infrequent posts on his social media.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그는 소셜 미디어에 게시물을 드문드문 올립니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Infrequent updates can leave the app vulnerable.
sentences.sentence_ko: 드문 업데이트는 앱을 취약하게 만들 수 있습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: We have infrequent meetings, so email is important.
sentences.sentence_ko: 우리는 회의가 잦지 않아서 이메일이 중요합니다.

sentences.sentence_en: I seldom eat fast food these days.
sentences.sentence_ko: 저는 요즘 패스트푸드를 거의 먹지 않습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: She is seldom late for work.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그녀는 좀처럼 회사에 지각하지 않습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: We seldom see such dedication in young students.
sentences.sentence_ko: 어린 학생들에게서 그런 헌신을 보기는 힘듭니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Opportunities like this come very seldom.
sentences.sentence_ko: 이런 기회는 아주 드물게 옵니다.

sentences.sentence_en: He seldom complains about the workload.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그는 업무량에 대해 좀처럼 불평하지 않습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Fresh water was scarce during the desert journey.
sentences.sentence_ko: 사막 여행 중에는 신선한 물이 부족했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Good developers are scarce in this region.
sentences.sentence_ko: 이 지역에서는 훌륭한 개발자를 찾기 힘듭니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Resources were scarce in the early days of the startup.
sentences.sentence_ko: 스타트업 초기에는 자원이 부족했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Information about the new product is scarce.
sentences.sentence_ko: 신제품에 대한 정보가 거의 없습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Vegetables become scarce in winter.
sentences.sentence_ko: 겨울에는 채소가 귀해집니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Smartphones have become commonplace in modern society.
sentences.sentence_ko: 스마트폰은 현대 사회에서 흔한 물건이 되었습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Remote work is becoming commonplace for developers.
sentences.sentence_ko: 원격 근무는 개발자들에게 흔한 일이 되고 있습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Electric cars are becoming more commonplace on the roads.
sentences.sentence_ko: 전기차가 도로에서 점점 더 흔해지고 있습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Such errors were commonplace in the old system.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그런 오류들은 구형 시스템에서는 흔했습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: It is commonplace to check emails on the weekend.
sentences.sentence_ko: 주말에 이메일을 확인하는 것은 흔한 일입니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Coffee shops are ubiquitous in Seoul.
sentences.sentence_ko: 서울에는 커피숍이 어디에나 있습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Smartphone usage is ubiquitous among teenagers.
sentences.sentence_ko: 십 대들 사이에서 스마트폰 사용은 보편적입니다.

sentences.sentence_en: Plastic waste has become a ubiquitous problem.
sentences.sentence_ko: 플라스틱 쓰레기는 어디에나 있는 문제가 되었습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: The internet is ubiquitous in our daily lives.
sentences.sentence_ko: 인터넷은 우리 일상생활 어디에나 존재합니다.

sentences.sentence_en: English is becoming a ubiquitous language in business.
sentences.sentence_ko: 영어는 비즈니스에서 어디서나 쓰이는 언어가 되고 있습니다.

sentences.sentence_en: We have an annual performance review at work.
sentences.sentence_ko: 우리는 직장에서 연례 성과 검토를 합니다.

sentences.sentence_en: The annual music festival attracts many tourists.
sentences.sentence_ko: 그 연례 음악 축제는 많은 관광객을 끌어모읍니다.

sentences.sentence_en: I go for an annual health checkup.
sentences.sentence_ko: 저는 매년 건강 검진을 받으러 갑니다.

sentences.sentence_en: The company publishes an annual report for investors.
sentences.sentence_ko: 회사는 투자자들을 위해 연례 보고서를 발행합니다.

sentences.sentence_en: My annual subscription to the app renews today.
sentences.sentence_ko: 제 앱 연간 구독이 오늘 갱신됩니다.
